# watchmen
A simple and easy-to-use toolkit for GPU scheduling.

![Demo](demo.png)

## Dependencies
- [Python](https://www.python.org/downloads/) >= 3.6
  - requests >= 2.24.0
  - pydantic >= 1.7.1
  - gpustat >= 0.6.0
  - flask >= 1.1.2
  - apscheduler >= 3.6.3

## Installation

1. Install dependencies.
```bash
$ pip install -r requirements.txt
```

2. Install watchmen.
```bash
$ pip install -e .
```
